alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 6:55AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Autauga, northern Lowndes and east central Dallas Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 655 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Selma, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Prattville, Selma, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Autaugaville, White Hall, Benton, Booth, Vida Junction, Gardner Island, Tyler, Autauga County Airport, Old Cahaba Park, Dallas County Horse Arena, Mulberry, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Potter Station, Robert F. Henry Lock And Dam and Hazen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central, south central and east central Alabama.
